items.sentence: You\'re old enough to know better, aren\'t you?
You\'re really serious about this, aren\'t you?
You\'re supposed to be downstairs, aren\'t you?
You\'re supposed to be practicing, aren\'t you?
Tom should\'ve already discussed that with you.
How much severance pay will we have to pay Tom?
There\'s always something new to see in Boston.
I\'m stuck here in Boston because of the storm.
I thought you wanted to wait until Tom arrived.
I thought you were going to come straight home.
